member.name: T:YAT.View.Utilities.CommandPagesSettingsClipboardHelper
member.remarks: Note there are similar implementations "Change", "Clipboard", "File" and "FileLink" to deal with subtle differences in behavior. Intentionally kept in parallel rather than making the implementation all-inclusive but less comprehensive. Separate classes to ease diffing.

member.name: M:YAT.View.Utilities.CommandPagesSettingsClipboardHelper.TrySet(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,YAT.Model.Settings.PredefinedCommandSettings,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies to the clipboard, prompting the user as required.
member.remarks: In case of an error, a modal message box is shown to the user.
Named 'Set' same as e.g. .

member.name: T:YAT.View.Utilities.RtfPrinter
member.summary: Utility class providing RTF printer functionality for YAT.

member.name: M:YAT.View.Utilities.RtfPrinter.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.param: true when called from , false when called from finalizer.

member.name: M:YAT.View.Utilities.RtfPrinter.Print(YAT.Domain.DisplayLineCollection,YAT.Format.Settings.FormatSettings)
member.remarks: Pragmatic implementation of printing RTF. Yet limited to printing in 'Device' format.
member.exception: The printer named in the property does not exist.

member.name: M:YAT.View.Utilities.RtfPrinter.Print(System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox)
member.remarks: Pragmatic implementation of printing RTF. Yet limited to printing in 'Device' format.
member.exception: The printer named in the property does not exist.

member.name: T:YAT.View.Utilities.RtfWriterHelper
member.summary: Static utility class providing RTF writer functionality for YAT.

member.name: F:YAT.View.Utilities.RtfWriterHelper.staticTxDataFontCache
member.remarks: For performance reasons, cache fonts.

member.name: M:YAT.View.Utilities.RtfWriterHelper.CopyLinesToClipboard(YAT.Domain.DisplayLineCollection,YAT.Format.Settings.FormatSettings)
member.remarks: Pragmatic implementation of copying RTF to the clipboard. 'netrtfwriter' is only used for stream-based logging.

member.name: M:YAT.View.Utilities.RtfWriterHelper.SaveLinesToFile(YAT.Domain.DisplayLineCollection,System.String,YAT.Format.Settings.FormatSettings)
member.remarks: Pragmatic implementation of saving RTF to a file. 'netrtfwriter' is only used for stream-based logging.

member.name: T:YAT.View.Utilities.TextWriterHelper
member.summary: Static utility class providing text writer functionality for YAT.

member.name: M:YAT.View.Utilities.TextWriterHelper.SaveLinesToFile(YAT.Domain.DisplayLineCollection,System.String,YAT.Format.Settings.FormatSettings)
member.remarks: Pragmatic implementation of saving text to a file.
